title: 84/493/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 October 1984 concerning the zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 instituting a specific Community regional development measure contributing to overcoming constraints on the development of new economic activities in certain zones adversely affected by restructuring of the steel industry (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
